title: Does Unity Ads support the Unity WebPlayer, or WebGL?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I want to know if Unity Ads is supported on the target platform for my game.

sections.title: Cause
content: You need to know if the web platforms that you are targeting supports our Unity Ads service.

sections.title: Resolution
content: No, Unity Ads does not currently support web platforms.
We are always exploring the option of adding new platforms and features. For the moment however, we only support iOS and Android.
